name: Github Issue Badge
description: Shows GitHub issues' information in simple badges

GITHUB_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID.description: GitHub application's OAuth client ID. ref: <https://developer.github.com/v3/oauth/>

GITHUB_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET.description: GitHub application's OAuth client secret. ref: <https://developer.github.com/v3/oauth/>

GITHUB_OAUTH_ACCESS_TOKEN.description: GitHub OAuth private access token; Setting this permits showing badges without user authorizing

GITHUB_API_ENDPOINT.description: GitHub API's endpoint URL. Specify if you want to show badges for GitHub:Enterprise. eg. 'https://ghe.example.com/api/v3/'

REDIS_URL.description: Redis server URL. You won't need this if you are using Heroku. eg. 'redis://localhost:6379'
